body: Like it says in the title, is there a way to look up players?
body_tagged: Like it says in the title, is there a way to look up players?
title: Is there a way to look up players?

replies.body:
If you mean looking them up on the forums, type "avicus.net/(player name)

Example: Avicus.net/TwentyOneTiggers
replies.body_tagged:
If you mean looking them up on the forums, type "avicus.net/(player name)

Example: Avicus.net/TwentyOneTiggers

replies.body:
What do you mean by "look up?"
Do you mean view stats, punishments, ranks?
Or something else?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: It's okay now! Twenty One Tiggers answered my question!
